mainText:
I have only had the pleasure of using Apple MacBook, & iPhone for a couple
 of years now, but I would just like to say THANK YOU. THANK YOU for being a
 visionary, an innovator. THANK YOU for developing products that will continue to have an impact on this world for years to come!

  My thoughts and prayers to the Jobs family. Your husband and father was truly an amazing individual!
author: Michael
